column5: Just signed on to new forum. I've attached a pic or two from my Quebec trip primarily to see if it works OK. I retired from 32 years being a CPA in June, and now work part time in fly fishing department at Cabelas in Dundee......paid to talk fishing all day!! A special gift for us this year as my son drew random R&R and is with us from Iraq, where he is a combat platoon leader with 10th Mountain Division. Life is indeed good, and much to be thankful for. Best to all out there.  Let me know if pics don't come thru.
Welcome to the board!!  Happy Thanksgiving to you also!!  Wonderful that your son is able to be there with you!! Oh, and no pics  bly
bigcreekdad, glad this holiday finds your son safe!  A lot of us owe him a big THANKS!  Whopper
Hope you and your family have a wonderful Thanksgiving weekend Bigcreekdad. Awesome news about being able to spend time your son.  Cheers, 1leg
Try this link OFC Board FAQ's  Picture posting and many other helpful things there!!  bly
